data.title: Full C Site Utility Barrier + Grav Net + Sensor Hold
data.description: Use this powerful set up to contest on the C Site, as this is a great way to solo hold and stall for your teammates' rotations.

data.title: Front B Site Sonic Sensor + Barrier Defense
data.description: Here's a great way to hold, or retake the B Site. It's not needed to combo the utility like so, but can be used independently in different situations. You can use the barrier to rotate off or prevent Attackers from retaking successfully.
